sentences: Born in New York City, he grew up with a fascination in the big band music of the 1930s and 1940s.
He performed with this orchestra at the 1995 Asian Pacific American Heritage Festival in New York City.
In 1998, he formed the ten-piece Jump, Jive & Wailers, named after the Louis Prima song "Jump, Jive an' Wail."
Gee is popular with lindy hoppers worldwide, including legendary Savoy Ballroom dancers Frankie Manning and Dawn Hampton.
